Serialized Form

Package gsingh.learnkirtan.component

Class gsingh.learnkirtan.component.ControlPanel extends javax.swing.JPanel implements Serializable

Serialized Fields

tempoControl

javax.swing.JSpinner tempoControl
A spinner controlling tempo. It is set to 1.0 by default, has an increment of 0.1, and has a range from .1 to 2. The shabad plays at this multiplier times the default speed (in the implementation, the length of each keypress is divided by this value to have the same effect). It cannot be changed while playing.

repeat

javax.swing.JCheckBox repeat
If checked, the selected playback lines will repeat when finished

startField

javax.swing.JTextField startField
If not empty, the playback will start here

endField

javax.swing.JTextField endField
If not empty, the playback will end here

controller

ShabadPlayer controller
